reviews.review_text: A nice place to stop by after a stroll by the English Bay. Beautiful space, loved the mini booth that s perfect for two. Ordered the lobster roll and some oysters - both were great options accompanied by a glass of white. Loved my choices, but also wished I could have ordered more. Probably the best fries I had in Vancouver too.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear guest, Thank you for the 5-star review! We hope to see you again. Regards, The Papis Team

reviews.review_text: Beautiful restaurant with an amazing view of the English bay. I love the decor. We had the clam chowder, oysters,  and fish tacos. Everything was cooked fresh to order and was expertly made! The clam chowder was full of flavour and had generous servings of clams, mussels and shrimp. It was delicious and buttery! Fish tacos were pan fried, simple and fresh. Great prices for happy hour. Excellent service. Will be back!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Pronatalist69, Thank you for the wonderful feedback. We look forward to welcoming you back soon. Regards, Papis Seafood and Oyster Bar

reviews.review_text: Love coming here for happy hour. Love their fried smelt dish. And their oyster deals are good. Always fresh and delicious . On a sunny day, theres no better patio than this at English bay in the west end. Ive been here many times and will continue to this summer. Good food and service. Highly recommend this place if youre looking for a nice patio by the beach
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Law, Thank you for the wonderful feedback. We look forward to welcoming you back soon. Regards, Papis Seafood and Oyster Bar

reviews.review_text: I loved this place, it was so close to me and I had never been.  The steak is very good, and the house wine too, I recommend it.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Livia, Thank you for the 5-star review! We hope to see you again. Regards, The Papis Team

reviews.review_text: Wonderful patio with a great view and amazing food! Had oysters and mussels with fries - would definitely recommend! Service and atmosphere was phenomenal Food
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Alexander, Thank you so much for the wonderful review! We hope to see you again soon. Regards, The Papis Team

reviews.review_text: an absolute banger of a restaurant! came here for happy hour(oysters, smelt and fries) and the service was amazing, the decor was phenomenal! would love to come back
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear guest, Thank you for the 5-star review! We hope to see you again. Regards, The Papis Team

reviews.review_text: Talk about fresh seafood! My husband is an oyster lover and he devoured his dish in 5 mins! Our aunt and I got a benny, its not the best in the world but it was fresh, and the hashbrowns had a nice crisp to it. The atmosphere was intimate; and gives off that nostalgic feel while taking a modern approach. Vegetarian options: Only 2, ( if you include the pancakes) but we came during early breakfast and brunch
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Connie, Thank you for the 5 star review. We look forward to welcoming you back soon. Regards, Papis Seafood and Oyster Bar

reviews.review_text: Delicious lobster rolls, kale salad and west coast (kusshi) oysters! What a great dinner experience! Top that up with a nice view. Staff were very friendly. I will definitely come back to this restaurant.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Mariana, Thank you for the 5 star review. We look forward to welcoming you back soon. Regards, Papis Seafood and Oyster Bar

reviews.review_text: Nice place and friendly service! Highly recommended. Good selection of sea food and options for non sea food munchers as well.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Ashwin, Thank you for your great review, we hope to see you in again soon! Thank you, Papis team

reviews.review_text: Great atmosphere, excellent service from the FOH team & the kitchen produced the food promptly and to a high standard. Great lunch spot on a sunny day with views of the beach & a really pleasant environment. I recommend & would go again without hesitation.

It was my first time coming here and I was very impressed with both the atmosphere, service, and food! On a sunny day, sitting on the patio, enjoying some white whine and seafood is the best! I highly recommend their oysters and fish n chips. My server, Zeki, was amazing! He had a great sense of humor, and was very personable and accommodating. He explained the oyster selection well, and gave me some recommendations on the wine selection.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Dennis, Thank you for your 5-star review and we hope to see you again! Regards, The Papis Team

reviews.review_text: Ive been coming to Papis for a few weeks now. I came here one night when I was feeling lonely and had nowhere to go, but as soon as I sat, the servers and waitstaff made me feel at home and part of the family. The servers make you feel so welcome and they are so easy to talk to. The best part is getting to know the servers on an individual level, they are all so friendly and unique.....the OUTSTANDING SEAFOOD and ambience of a bustling beachside neighborhood is a bonus. The food is ABSOLUTELY worth coming here for.. BELIEVE ME....the oysters and everything else on the menu are 2DIE4...but its the service and waitstaff that makes this place truly unique and special. This place is definitely my go to spot for fresh seafood and oysters. Youll have a heck of a good time at Papis guaranteed!!!.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Julio, Thank you for the amazing review, the team are delighted to hear all the amazing feedback. We hope to see you again soon. Regards, Papis Seafood and Oyster Bar Team.

reviews.review_text: Awesome! Very recomendable the fish and chips! The poke bowl was great aswell :) And the view:
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Eva, Thank you for the 5 star review. We look forward to welcoming you back soon. Regards, Papis Seafood and Oyster Bar

reviews.review_text: I don t know why this place isn t busier! A lovely patio, and the food is amazing. Best fish and chips we ve ever had (the halibut). Fish tacos were delicious as well, very fresh! And the fries . Amazing.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Jenna! Thank you for taking a moment to leave us with some positive feedback! We re glad you enjoyed the food so much! We re constantly striving to improve our food and service, and look forward to hosting you again soon for an even better experience! Kind regards, The Papi s Team

reviews.review_text: Best clam chowder ever!!!! Ive tried hundreds of them, but this one is something beyond the real life. Their chef  is the best so far... atmosphere is nice. Patio in front of sunset is amazing. Will come here again for sure.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to leave a review. We look forward to welcoming you back soon. Regards, Papis Seafood and Oyster Bar

reviews.review_text: 10/10! The service, food, drink and music  everything is really good! Seafood is fresh.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Guest, Thank you for your 5-star review and we hope to see you again! Regards, The Papis Team

reviews.review_text: We went for happy hour and would definitely recommend!! Great food at great prices - the oysters were super fresh!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to leave a review. We look forward to welcoming you back soon. Regards, Papis Seafood and Oyster Bar

reviews.review_text: Very cute nautical theme, right by the water. Good seafood, good value.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Kelsey, Thank you for the 5 star review. We look forward to welcoming you back soon. Regards, Papis Seafood and Oyster Bar

reviews.review_text: Nice location, comfy terrace with beautiful view. Service is very impressive. Wide selection of wine, fabulous seafood. Fresh oyster, Calamari is crispy outside tender inside, clam spaghetti is my friend s favorite, Lobster risotto might be the best one in town! Slow stewed beef is unbelievable great in a seafood restaurant, dessert is another surprise to us...Must be back again.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Guest, Thank you for the great review. Hope to see you again soon! Regards, Kelly JH Sales and Marketing Manage

reviews.review_text: Came here to catch the sunset and the view from the patio is seriously the best. Ordered a platter of oysters and they came super quick and were so so fresh. Tbh i ve never liked cocktail sauce but papi s is different and was delicious!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to leave a review. We look forward to welcoming you back soon. Regards, Papis Seafood and Oyster Bar

reviews.review_text: Great vibe with great service and Amazing food! We got the Seafood boil sharing for 2 people at $24 per person, the bread that came wasn t enough for us but you could always ask for extra at no extra cost so that was A+ for that. Location couldn t have been better anyplace else. A must visit place when you re in Vancouver.

Hands down one of the best dining out experiences I ve had.     Drinks were amazing.  The Caesar and the mai Tais were honestly the best!   Food was even better.  The selection of oysters was abundant!   The lobster roll was yummy.  So were the Caesar  salad and fish tacos!   The servers were friendly. We had a birds eye view for the most beautiful sunset.  Definitely will return back
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Guest, Thank you for the kind words. Look forward to welcoming you back soon. Regards, Kelly Jordan - Hamilton Sales and Marketing Manager

reviews.review_text: My new favourite weekend brunch spot. Great views, great food, and not bad prices. I recommend sitting on the spacious patio they have heaters that keep you warm even in the winter . We have the Canadian Benny , crab Benny both were excellent! Highly recommend this place!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Guest, Thank you for your review, We hope to see you again soon. Best regards, Kelly Jordan-Hamilton Sales and Marketing Manager

reviews.review_text: The food at papis is delicious. the staff is incredibly nice, right when you walk in the incredible host and staff make u feel so welcomed. service is great. 100% recommend going to papis for some fresh seafood.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Lara, we re very happy you had a good experience here at Papi s! we re glad that you felt so welcomed and are looking forward to seeing you again soon! Kind regards, the Papi s Team

reviews.review_text: Recently we visited Papis Vancouver Downtown. The location of the former rain city grill, perfectly situated at English Bay. The venue itself is clean, very clean and very stylish decorated. The staff is friendly and offering several options food, drink combination etc. Seafood based, our meals were delivered in time, great quality and the taste to our satisfaction. We will return!
5 stars for atmosphere, food, ocean view, service, location and value. Had the seafood Thai curry dish and west coast oysters. A new must visit for my trips to Van.

Ordered the fish and chips cause a friend suggested this place and it came out golden along with the fries. The food was delicious but the staff made my day, they are some of the friendliest people you can meet! Will be coming back as a regular for sure
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to leave a review. We look forward to welcoming you back soon. Regards, Papis Seafood and Oyster Bar

reviews.review_text: One of the best and most affordable restaurants in that area! Staff were quick and attentive. Their new menu is well curated by their amazing new chefs! Cant wait to come again

hella oysters (I dont eat them but heard they were amazing) and the ling cod was so juicy! I loved the fried smelt too, with some lemon and that sauce? So good!! Thank you for your hospitality, Papis!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to leave a review. We look forward to welcoming you back soon. Regards, Papis Seafood and Oyster Bar

reviews.review_text: We walked in with out a reservation on a Friday night.  We were seated immediately and the view was pleasing. The service was attentive with out feeling pestered. A detailed explanation of items on the menu was helpful. The food was fresh, delicious and beyond plentiful.  I will definitely return to enjoy this intimate delightfully decorated restaurant.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to leave a review. We look forward to welcoming you back soon. Regards, Papis Seafood and Oyster Bar

reviews.review_text: The Caesars come with an oyster! We really enjoyed our brunch. Definitely will be a regular weekend place.

Surprisingly good place with ocean breeze. Amazing staff members and who actually enjoy working in the bar. It s a good lively place!! I had oysters Kilpatrick and calamari. tzatziki sauce that came with calamari was amazing
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to leave a review. We look forward to welcoming you back soon. Regards, Papis Seafood and Oyster Bar

reviews.review_text: Yesterday, June 7th 2023, my wife and I had the great pleasure of spending the afternoon on the outdoor patio at Papis. We had travelled from YYZ, and walked towards English Bay from our hotel, searching for sunlight, a terrific view  warm breezes, comfortable patio, relaxation, and good food. We were pleasantly surprised, actually thrilled to find all at Papis! The food - excellent! The service - extraordinary, music perfect. Sunlight, terrific view, terrific service! Oh my goodness, this is great! We both remarked we hit a 10 of 10 on the relaxation scale - instantly. Many, many thanks to the terrific team, and the location. Well be back! With Gratitude, Jay and Anne Paterson,
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Jay and Anne, Thank you for the 5 star review. We look forward to welcoming you back next time your in the city! Hope you had a great trip. Regards, Papis Seafood and Oyster Bar

reviews.review_text: First time coming here with my wife. Was not a big fan of Oysters but after trying some here, I now have a new favourite. The view is outstanding especially if you come during sunset. The staff is very friendly, truly making you feel at home. Definitely will be going back.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Peter. Thank you for the great review and lovely feedback. We  look forward to welcoming you back, to have your new favorite dish. Regards, Kelly JH Sales and Marketing Manager

reviews.review_text: My first meal in Vancouver did not disappoint! From the oysters to the desert it was all amazing. I look forward to coming back for the delicious food and excellent service!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Thank you for the review! Look forward to welcoming you back soon. Regards, Kelly Jordan -Hamilton Sales and Marketing Manager

reviews.review_text: Best priced Halibut and chips in town 2 huge pieces (I took one home) beautifully cooked Fish Staff are adorable! Worst fish and chips is the white spot!!
Met a friend here for drinks and the Caesar comes with an oyster!! The bartender and servers were so friendly and we had a blast. Highly recommend checking this place out!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to leave a review. We look forward to welcoming you back soon. Regards, Papis Seafood and Oyster Bar

reviews.review_text: I recently visited Papi s Restaurant and can t say enough about our experience. We were fortunate to be seated on the patio for Happy Hour and the view was spectacular! We tried a selection of Oysters, the Prawn Arancini and Crab Cakes to start. Hands down some of the best crab cakes I ve eaten in Vancouver. We then shared a fish and chips for the main course. Wow! I m Australian and haven t found a place that makes fish and chips like the motherland until now. The batter was cooked to perfection, not too heavy and I really loved that they had two fish to select from. Huge shout out to the General Manager Dan for making our date night so special. I was surprised that a GM would personally serve our table but that is the vibe Papi s provides. It s not too big. You don t feel like a number. The service is so friendly and you won t leave disappointed. Highly recommend for a trip to the West End! Thanks Papi s!!

Such a delicious surprise to stop there on our walk, all the food taste glorious We had fish and fries (amazing) and Thai curry with seafood   espectacular recommendations Alcohol price was shockingly low        we ll definitely come back the next visit to Vancouver
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Vero! It was a pleasure hosting you recently here at Papi s! we re glad you enjoyed the experience and are happy you found our alcohol prices reasonable! We re always trying to deliver value! We hope to see you again soon! Kind regards, the Papi s Team

reviews.review_text: The place is tops if you like sea-fare at reasonable prices. The chips were out of this world crisp , dare I say perfect! I cant wait to come back for more.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Shane, Thank you for the 5 star review. We look forward to welcoming you back soon. Regards, Papis Seafood and Oyster Bar

reviews.review_text: Great food, right in the edge of English Bay and Denman and Davis Street, but yet off enough to have a very comfortable patio. Foods great, and that coffee is awesome.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Randy, Thank you for the 5 star review. We look forward to welcoming you back soon. Regards, Papis Seafood and Oyster Bar

reviews.review_text: We enjoyed our meal very much, service was friendly and prompt. Osters and mussels were great.

We had a nice meal here on our wedding anniversary We chose it for its patio location across from the bay and it s seafood for me. The Thai curry seafood dish was very tasty and worth the higher cost &26 The fish tacos my wife said were good too Not the cheapest place to eat down there but good food and lovely waitress. Nice location Recommended

Me and my friend had a great time having some oysters and white wine...so delicious! We want to thanks Charlie cause she was all the time super nice with us and she gave us a great service. The whole experience was great also we had beautiful sunny day at the terrace. Gracias !!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Mauro, Thank you for the review. Look forward to welcoming you back soon. Regards, Papis Seafood and Oyster Bar Team.

reviews.review_text: Great take-out fish burger deal for $6!  A big piece of fish crisply battered and tender. Dressed perfectly and served with a big slice of a deli pickle!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Donna, Thank you so much for your great review. Delighted to hear you enjoyed our Battered Fish Sandwich. Hopefully next time you get the chance to join us inside and try some more of our menu items. Regards, Kelly Jordan - Hamilton Sales and Marketing Manager

reviews.review_text: Really enjoyed the experience, the family had the mussels, lobster club, salmon burger and fish and chips, all good. Recommend!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Jason, Thank you so much for the wonderful review! We hope to see you again soon. Regards, The Papis Team

reviews.review_text: The restaurant is fantastic. All the staff is super friendly. The food is delicious. I think Chef Stan is very good at his job.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Aldo, Thank you for the 5 star review. We look forward to welcoming you back soon. Regards, Papis Seafood and Oyster Bar

reviews.review_text: Great spot for happy hour oysters and other snacks! Loved the crispy fries and smelt. Drinks were great too.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Lindsay, Thank you for the 5 star review. We look forward to welcoming you back soon. Regards, Papis Seafood and Oyster Bar

reviews.review_text: Went here before the pandemic for brunch but forgot to leave a review. Amazing food and service. Fresh oysters. Very nice location. Highly recommend!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Guest, Thank you for the lovely review, we are also  re-launching brunch this weekend. Hope to see you again soon! Regards, Kelly JH Sales and Marketing Manager

reviews.review_text: foods great, super tasty fish tacos   cocktail sauce    +   pet friendly and service was excellent
Probably the best calamari I ve had in years! Great wine selection and amazing view.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Viola, Thank you for the 5 star review. We look forward to welcoming you back soon. Regards, Papis Seafood and Oyster Bar

reviews.review_text: Gem in the heart of English Bay. Staff were attentive and genuinely nice. You can tell making the customers happy is their main priority. Calamari and fish & chips done right. Happy hour is good value too. Nice wine selection.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to leave a review. We look forward to welcoming you back soon. Regards, Papis Seafood and Oyster Bar

reviews.review_text: Great menu selections of both food and wines. Staff were attentive without being over-bearing. Great background music as well ... Had my Shazam working overtime
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Victor Thank you for taking the time to leave your great review. Our bartenders will be delighted to hear you like there music selection. Hope to see you again soon! Regards, Kelly JH Sales and Marketing Manager

reviews.review_text: Love this place! Super fresh, authentic and absolutely delicious. We ordered the Thai-style seafood curry, the Sirloin Centre Cut Stake and the New England Style Chowder. Weve been here numerous times since discovering it! Wed cross the border just to eat here. Great service and management are very friendly. Highly recommend.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to leave a review. We look forward to welcoming you back soon. Regards, Papis Seafood and Oyster Bar

reviews.review_text: Right across from the beach with a nice view. My son loved the oysters here. It was alot quieter than some of the other places across the street which we greatly appreciated.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello, Thank you for the great review, Hope to see you again soon! Regards, Kelly JH Sales and Marketing Manager

reviews.review_text: Good oysters, good drinks and beautiful patio. Servers are helpful and kind. Will be back
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Leo! We re delighted to hear you had such an enjoyable experience at Papi s! we are constantly looking to improve both our food and beverage programs, and are excited to host you again soon for an equally delicious meal on our patio! Kind regards, The Papi s Team

reviews.review_text: Great view of English Bay, nice menu, good cocktails, very friendly staff. I will return!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Darren, Thank you for your 5-star review and we hope to see you again! Regards, The Papis Team

reviews.review_text: I liked it, parking lot around the block, was not so busy on Friday night, tables and dishes clean, food was great, loved selection of oysters, could be good to have better variety of dressings for them.

Repeat take out because the first calamari and Halibut was amazing! Again great staff; had G&T while waiting for (fast) order. Wonderful halibut (2 this time) and great calamari again. All Good! Great staff and location! Looking forward to new fall menu - hope calamari stays! PS: Lobster Roll is great too!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to leave a review. We look forward to welcoming you back soon. Regards, Papis Seafood and Oyster Bar

reviews.review_text: This was our favourite place to eat on our trip. Clean, bright, welcoming, friendly service and absolutely delicious food!! Our waiter helped us with our order, made fantastic suggestions. Highly recommended!!

Been coming to this spot for a few times now. Phenomenal view. Good vibe. Great food. Try their Halibut Fish and Chips, I was watching the open kitchen make it to order and not the frozen or pre made ones you usually get in some restaurants. But the staff is really what makes this place a favourite! Courteous, friendly and very professional group of people. Cheers to the management and the whole team! Keep the amazing service and wonderful food coming!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to leave a review. We look forward to welcoming you back soon. Regards, Papis Seafood and Oyster Bar

reviews.review_text: Excellent experience in summer with open windows. Delicious food, good and filling portions. Very fresh and prepared quick.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Alexey, Thank you for the 5 star review. We look forward to welcoming you back soon. Regards, Papis Seafood and Oyster Bar

reviews.review_text: amazing customer service! i love the food especially the fish n chips, it was fresh and very tasty! the waiting time was reasonable as well and the staff as a whole was amazing! this is definitely my new go to restaurant !

Went here a few times..nice view of the beach from the balcony side and love their food here. Tried the Oysters and it is now on my lists of my fav oyster place. Calamari, fish and chips, angus burger that my son really liked. Service crew are really amazing. I ordered Deep fried smelt and asked for extra crispy and definitely listened to my request. I would recommend this place.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to leave a review. We look forward to welcoming you back soon. Regards, Papis Seafood and Oyster Bar

reviews.review_text: This is my new favourite oyster bar   how have I just discovered it now ? I often go to Fanny Bay Oysters but I love how much oyster selection Pappi s has. The staff are lovely and provide down to earth, friendly service. The view on the patio is top notch on a clear day.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to leave a review. We look forward to welcoming you back soon. Regards, Papis Seafood and Oyster Bar

reviews.review_text: The food are delicious.  The staff is really what has me coming back.   This restaurant has a great set of people. Management did a great job managing their staff. It is also very busy at this restaurant and the employees are just so nice and great! Amazing food and amazing staff. Thank you.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to leave a review. We look forward to welcoming you back soon. Regards, Papis Seafood and Oyster Bar

reviews.review_text: great service, food & wine and location just few steps from English Bat
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Jakub, Thank you for the 5-star review. We hope to see you in again soon! Regards, The Papis team

reviews.review_text: The freshest shellfish weve had in years. Looking forward to our next time:))

Really enjoyed the oysters and main courses we ordered. Our server made some great recommendations on what to order. The fried smelts were a first for my husband and he loved them! Lovely location. The patio offers some great people watching opportunities.

My husband and I were very pleased with the food and service here. Our waitress was very friendly and personable. The food was delicious and well priced. The signature cocktails were also very good and original. The decor and atmosphere is very cute as well. We are happy to have a new place to go for dinner so close to us and can t wait to come back! Thank you :)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Celine, Thank you for your review, We hope to see you again soon. Best regards, Kelly Jordan-Hamilton Sales and Marketing Manager

reviews.review_text: Got some oysters a beer and fries on a beautiful sunny Sunday in the West End. Our server was doing double duty and clearly communicated expectations as they were short staffed. That being said drinks were out in fiver or fewer minutes, food under ten min tutes. Juicy oysters, great ambiance, phenomenal view. Server also had excellent manners which is very much appreciated. Will certainly be back.

This place is fantastic. First of all, location is amazing. View of the water, view of the bustling city and vibrant life and many more. More than that,  the food are exceptional. We had their lobster roll, fried fish (can t remember the name, haha. Long ones for apples), fries, oysters and their seafood curry. It is to die for. If you like rich, exotic and full of flavour. This is a must! Have it with pasta or dip it in bread or eat it as is. Delisioso. The staff were on the younger demographic but they great. Very polite and easy to talk to. Would recommend this place to anyone looking for a place to lounge and drink or to have a feast. Will come again!

Great food especially their seafood curry and lobster roll. Drinks looked extraordinary. Like the Paloma and their papis ceaser.  Great service. Very friendly and kind. Checked up on me and my family a couple times during our stay. Definitely a place to keep going too!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to leave a review. We look forward to welcoming you back soon. Regards, Papis Seafood and Oyster Bar

reviews.review_text: After doing just take outs and deliveries for almost a year, we finally decided to try dining in at Papis Seafood and Oyster Bar! Turned out to be a perfect restaurant to start the culinary experience at Vancouver.  The restaurant was perfect ambience with sunset views from the patio and amazing seafood.   I tried the fish tacos which were light and had light tangy flavour and then for the first time ever I tried a lobster roll.  I was not disappointed. The creamy buttery lobster with their secret sauce was finger licking good and went great with their cocktails, specially mezcal based drink called smoke and mirrors! Our server were friendly and patient.  Pro-actively checked on us and made sure we were enjoying our meal. Would definitely recommend this to everyone!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Guest, Thank you for the great review. Look forward to welcoming you back soon. Regards, Papis Seafood and Oyster Bar Team.

reviews.review_text: Amazing food. Amazing service and just very nice staff. Definitely coming back. Im pretty picky with food and this is very good pricing for something that tastes this delicious. Will definitely be back!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to leave a review. We look forward to welcoming you back soon. Regards, Papis Seafood and Oyster Bar

reviews.review_text: Perfect place to watch the sunset! We shared oysters and the mussels, both were fantastic. Oysters were so fresh and well shucked (no grit), the mussels also very fresh and the broth was incredible (we tried the white wine and shallot). My friend got the steak frites and it was excellent, I got the lobster roll and very much enjoyed it. They also make the most amazing fries. Cant wait to try the fish n chips!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Guest, Thank you for your review, We hope to see you again soon. Best regards, Kelly Jordan-Hamilton Sales and Marketing Manager

reviews.review_text: Had a impromptu dinner date with the husband, took a bit to get a table, but we didnt have a reservation so it was understandable. The seaview from the patio is amazing.  Food was excellent & worth the wait. Jeanine was our server. she was a sweetheart, checking in us often without being overbearing :)

We had a delightful lunch today on the heated patio watching the sudden rain shower and beautiful views of English Bay. We had the Oysters Kilpatrick (delicious) a full dozen of the raw, and split the two piece halibut and chips. The fish was cooked to perfection and the chips were great. Our service was outstanding and GM Dan was superb. Treated us very well and personally ensured we were well taken care of. Highly recommend.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Andrea, Thank you for the review, our team and Dan will be so happy to hear your feedback. Look forward to welcoming you back soon. Regards, Papis Seafood and Oyster Bar Team.

reviews.review_text: We have been to Papis twice and loved it both times! The service is amazing and the food is fantastic. On both of our visits we had more food than we could possibly eat and were delightfully satisfied with the flavours and options. Everyone in the restaurant treated us with such kindness and welcomed us as if we were one of the family. The decor and ambiance of the restaurant is cozy and elegant. We will definitely go back! Thanks to Alessandro and Style for hosting us and treating us so well!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Guest, Thank you for the great review. Hope to see you again soon! Regards, Kelly JH Sales and Marketing Manager

reviews.review_text: Terrific little restaurant with excellent service and a great view. We had the obligatory fish and chips (which were terrific), but were absolutely delighted by the lobster risotto (an absolute must have), creamed butternut squash soup, octopus popcorn (wow!) and a great selection of oysters. Without regret, we gave in to temptation and procured a couple oyster shooters with tequila (try it - you wont be disappointed!) and never looked back. Our service was exceptional, the hosts were very friendly and the food was excellently prepared with great presentation. If you havent been here before, you should go soon. Will definitely return!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Guest, Thank you for the great review. Hope to see you again soon! Regards, Kelly JH Sales and Marketing Manager

reviews.review_text: Great Location. The food was delicious. Very friendly service. We will be back soon. Thank you

Papi s has the best view of English Bay and a great happy hour to go with it. The staff are awesome and so friendly. Patio is ideal in the sunshine. Oysters and fish tacos were both delicious. Really enjoyed their cocktail selection as well, the Caesar is on the pricey side but it s worth a try. Will be returning for sure!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Guest, Thank you for the kind words. Look forward to welcoming you back soon. Regards, Kelly Jordan - Hamilton Sales and Marketing Manager

reviews.review_text: Last night we had the pleasure of sitting out on the new street patio at Papi s. Our server was fantastic and very thorough with her communication. The oysters were some of the best we ve had in Vancouver and the salmon burger was perfect! Great experience!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Thank you for the great review! Look forward to welcoming you back soon. Regards, Kelly Jordan -Hamilton Sales and Marketing Manager

reviews.review_text: Friendly staff, delicious oysters and well located!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to leave a review. We look forward to welcoming you back soon. Regards, Papis Seafood and Oyster Bar

reviews.review_text: Absolutely wonderful restaurant with outstanding service and the best food
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Lorie, thank you for taking the time to join us here at Papi s! we re pleased to hear that you enjoyed both the food and service! We re looking forward to seeing you again soon! Kind regards, The Papi s Team

reviews.review_text: I want to give a shout out to the staff at Papi s. Thanks for the best times. You re all friendly and wonderful. It s a super casual and relaxing way to enjoy the summer. The menu was just revised and it s amazing! Thank you for having us.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to leave a review. We look forward to welcoming you back soon. Regards, Papis Seafood and Oyster Bar

reviews.review_text: Lovely restaurant with fresh, delicious food. We had the lobster roll and the fried rockfish and chips, and both were wonderful.  Highly recommend!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to leave a review. We look forward to welcoming you back soon. Regards, Papis Seafood and Oyster Bar

reviews.review_text: Great Atmosphere, good service. Manager and staff very friendly. Foods great. Nice view of English Bay Food

Today. I tried the Pipi s for Lunch! It was great, fantastic, perfect to be honest!  So I came back for happy hour.  Ones got to check off the bucket list, the one off...   I was amazed by the staff, the food and drink.  Location, location and location.   I ve traveled the world, have dined in some fantastic places. When in Vancouver my go to place was always Joe s.  Not anymore!  I was treated to excellent food both times! Fantastic people that can smile with there eyes(Very important these days).  The patio is a dream come true.  The restaurant is spotless, through and through!  The price was  More then fair .  Paying your tab is a real treat, no pressure!!!  I have been humbled.  Thank you guys for giving such an incredible experience!!! Kelley
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Kelly, Thank you so much for the review. Look forward to welcoming you back soon. Regards, Papis Seafood and Oyster Bar Team.

reviews.review_text: Delicious seafood, outstanding service. My wife and parents had dinner here last night and It was a great experience. Our server was as friendly and personable as can be, and the food was fresh and full of flavor. Will be back forsure.

We had a fantastic time at Papis this past Saturday for dinner. We enjoyed the oysters, I had the beef short rib, my dad had the Atlantic char, and his fiance had the risotto. We were all impressed with our meals, they were flavourful and well presented. The service was also incredible, we will definitely be returning!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Guest, Thank you for your review. We hope to see you again soon. Thank you, Best regards, Kelly JH Sales and Marketing Manager

reviews.review_text: Travelled from Ireland to Vancouver for holidays. Just passing this restaurant we said we would try it. The food was amazing and really nice location. If you are looking for somewhere nice to eat try this restaurant you won t be disappointed.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to leave a review. We look forward to welcoming you back soon. Regards, Papis Seafood and Oyster Bar

reviews.review_text: One of my favorite places in Vancouver. You cannot go wrong here.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Lukas, Thank you for the 5-star review - we hope to see you again soon. Regards, The Papis Team

reviews.review_text: Absolutely excellent. FINALLY management that does justice to this wonderful location. The menu is great, the oysters are fresh, the drinks are good (probably their best potential area of improvement, but still completely adequate) and the service is excellent. This will be my new local. :)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello, Thank you for leaving such a great review. We are delighted you found your new local, we look forward to seeing you again soon.

reviews.review_text: Great food! I had an amazing time at the patio overlooking the beach
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello, Thank you for the review. We look forward to welcoming you back soon. Regards, Papis Seafood and Oyster Bar

reviews.review_text: Update: This has to be one of the best patios to enjoy some wine and food while watching the glorious sunsets on English Bay. My brother and I adored our waiter Lenny. Great spot for people watching too. Amazing West End #WeAmaze Below is my older post from when they first opened. Went last night and sat at a sunny, safe table on the patio. Rebecca was our great waitress. Sampled some oysters and tuna tataki, happy hour wine. Nice first date in a long time. Best patio location. The menu has improved quite a bit since it was Beach Bay Cafe. Limited wine selection though, its either red or white. They have a delicious cocktail called a Sea Wall Banger that is wildly refreshing. He had the fish and chips and was well impressed. I had the kale, quinoa summer beet salad and it was scrumptious. They just opened and a few growing pains Im sure they will overcome in no time.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Moira Thank you for the great review and feedback. Look forward to welcoming you back soon. Regards, Kelly Jordan -Hamilton Sales and Marketing Manager

reviews.review_text: Outside Restaurant decor seems a little outdated but I was very impressed with the quality of the food; it was the best seafood pasta I have ever had in downtown Vancouver. Generous portion size and good price. I will definitely come back.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Thank you for the review! Look forward to welcoming you back soon. Regards, Kelly Jordan -Hamilton Sales and Marketing Manager

reviews.review_text: Came here because I was craving oysters. The food was delicious! and the drinks strong. The staff were very kind to us and especially when someone mentioned it was my bday! Looking forward to returning to try out other menu items.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Guest, Thank you for your review, We hope to see you again soon. Best regards, Kelly Jordan-Hamilton Sales and Marketing Manager

reviews.review_text: Amazing, fast friendly service. Haven t been able to dine in because I ve only discovered Papi s since after the pandemic but the takeout menu is awesome and so quick! Top quality fish and chips and the Fraser valley chicken burger is one of the best chicken burgers I ve had in recent years. Looking forward to dining in when this is all over
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Guest, Thank you for your review, We hope to see you again soon, stay safe Thank you, Best regards, Kelly JH Sales and Marketing Manager

reviews.review_text: Food was great but service was better. Our server made sure we were well taken care of from start to finish.
